CB: calculated manually from paper data: CAPEX = 11 MEUR, (as stated in the paper) and 65 kt/a plant. See

This source states fixed cost of 11 MEUR/a for a capacity of 440 kt/a, which yields total fixed OPEX of 11000/440=25 EUR/t. Although it is quoted as a fixed OPEX cost, we give this as a vopex cost, since it is in EUR/t

Nyari misquotes the result from Collodi (2017). There are in fact 61 workers * 60 000 mean salary =3.66MEUR/a. Production of 5000 MTPD => 1.825e6 t/a.Although it is quoted as a fixed OPEX cost, we give this as a vopex cost, since it is in EUR/t

Nyari misquotes the result from Collodi (2017). admin + overhead component = 30% * (direct_labour + om). Here we have only the 30% * direct labour.Production of 5000 MTPD => 1.825e6 t/a. Although it is quoted as a fixed OPEX cost, we give this as a vopex cost, since it is in EUR/t
Nyari misquotes the result from Collodi (2017). admin + overhead component = 30% * (direct_labour + om). Here we have only the 30% * om = 0.45% of TPC .
